name: LD24
description:
Lemon Tree team proudly presents a game full of heartbreaking tragedy, sparkling humor and epic action. The story is told by brave cow who has challenged the world with hope to find her love.

Try to find a couple of easter eggs!

Tools: cocos2d (java script, html5), box2d
